functions.tag: {display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"Tempest\",\"color\":\"dark_aqua\",\"italic\":false}",Lore:['{"text":"The bow of Gishira the Storm Archer,","color":"gray"}','{"text":"who had faith in her people until the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"end, although they could not say the","color":"gray"}','{"text":"same for her.","color":"gray"}','{"text":"--------","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Damage: 9","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Stamina Regeneration Delay: 1.7s","color":"gray"}','{"text":"Knockback I","color":"gray"}']},Unbreakable:1b,HideFlags:7,Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:knockback",lvl:1}],AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"generic.attack_speed",Operation:0,Amount:1020,UUID:[I;962755434,1619171925,1960948752,-1557913441],Slot:"mainhand"}],HoldingID:50}
